title: The Natural (+Intelligence)
description: When you Seek Insight, you may roll +Intelligence instead of +Wisdom and add "What opportunity does no one else see?" to the list of possible questions.

title: A Life of Crime
description: You start with either Burgle or Light Fingers (your choice) as an extra move and either burglar tools or a hidden stash (your choice) as an additional special possession.

title: The Prodigal Returned (+Charisma)
description: When you declare that you know someone outside of Stonetop, someone who can help, name them and roll.

outcomes.text: Yeah they can help (tell us why they're willing).
They can help but pick 1 from the list below:
bullets: They're going to need something from you first
They swore off this sort of thing a long time ago
You can't exactly, y'know, trust them

outcomes.text: The GM chooses 1 and then some

title: Dabbler - (Requires level 2+ and the Fox)
description: Each time you take this move, learn a new skill from Heavy, Marshal, Ranger, or Seeker

title: Danger Sense (+Intelligence)
description: You can always ask the GM, "Is there an ambush or trap here?" If they say "yes", roll +Intelligence.

outcomes.text: Ask the GM both of the questions below
bullets: What will trigger the ambush or trap?
What will happen once its triggered?

outcomes.text: Don't mark XP; you know there's a trap or ambush, but nothing bad happens just yet.

title: Skill at Arms
description: When you wield a weapon with speed and grace, roll +Dexterity to Clash (instead of +Strength).

title: Silver Tongued (+Charisma)
description: When you use words to avoid suspicion or trouble, roll +Charisma.

title: Laugh at Danger
description: When you are about to roll +Constitution and you make a joke about the adversity you face, you can roll +Charisma instead.

title: Rapier Wit
description: When you pierce an NPC's pride with a well-placed quip, they must do 1 (their choice):

bullets: Attack, doing +1d4 damage if they hit but giving you advantage on your next roll against them
Stoop to your level and respond in kind
Spend a few moments fuming, sputtering or controlling their temper

title: Under Your Skin
description: When you engage an NPC in conversation, you can ask the GM 1 of these and get an honest answer:

bullets: What are they expecting me to do?
What, in general, are they trying to hide?
What do they want to happen?

title: Improved Stat
description: Increase one of your stats by +1 (to a max of +2)

title: Superior Stat (Requires level 6+)
description: Increase one of your stats by +1 (to a max of +3)

title: Pants on Fire (Requires level 6+)
description: When you Defy Danger, Persuade or Interfere by being deceitful, you have advantage.  When another move (like Seek Insight) allows a player ot ask you a question, you can opt not to answer.

title: Eye on the door (Requires level 6+)
description: When you and your allies need to get out of here, name your escape route and roll +Intelligence

outcomes.text: You can stay or go but if you go, it costs you - the GM will tell you what (or who) you leave behind or take with you.
